mapper.select: select id, subject_id, like_user_id, status, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted from subject_liked where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into subject_liked(subject_id, like_user_id, status, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values (#{subjectId}, #{likeUserId}, #{status}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted})

insert into subject_liked(id, subject_id, like_user_id, status, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.subjectId}, #{entity.likeUserId}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})

insert into subject_liked(subject_id, like_user_id, status, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.subjectId}, #{entity.likeUserId}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})
on duplicate key update subject_id = values(subject_id), like_user_id = values(like_user_id), status = values(status), created_by = values(created_by), created_time = values(created_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted)

INSERT INTO subject_liked (subject_id, like_user_id, status, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) VALUES
(#{item.subjectId}, #{item.likeUserId}, #{item.status}, #{item.createdBy}, #{item.createdTime}, #{item.updateBy}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.isDeleted})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE status = VALUES(status), created_by = VALUES(created_by), created_time = VALUES(created_time), update_by = VALUES(update_by), update_time = VALUES(update_time), is_deleted = VALUES(is_deleted)
mapper.update:
update subject_liked
subject_id = #{subjectId},
like_user_id = #{likeUserId},
status = #{status},
created_by = #{createdBy},
created_time = #{createdTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
where id = #{id}
